title: Calories in a Gala Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in a gala apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for one medium fruit.
assumptions: Medium-sized Gala apple (~182 g with skin and core), raw, unpeeled, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check produce labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium Gala apple provides ~95 kcal and ~4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a medium Gala apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium Gala apple with skin.

faqs.q: Does a Gala apple have fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, ~4.4 g dietary fiber per medium apple, mostly soluble pectin.

faqs.q: Are Gala apples high in sugar?
faqs.a: They contain ~19 g natural sugars per medium apple, mainly fructose.

faqs.q: Calories in a Gala apple vs. other varieties?
faqs.a: Similar to most apples; Gala is slightly sweeter but comparable at ~95 kcal medium size.

faqs.q: Is peeling a Gala apple worth it for fewer calories?
faqs.a: Peeling reduces ~5 kcal and some fiber, but skin adds nutrientsâ€”keep it on for benefits.
